Package dev.project276.entity

Class Pathfinder

java.lang.Object
dev.project276.entity.Pathfinder
public class Pathfinder
extends java.lang.Object
Computes the walkable space of the gameBoard, marks points where Entities reside, and handles the pathfinding for Enemies.

  • Method Details

    • initFloorBoard

      public void initFloorBoard()
      Initializes our 2D boolean array floorBoard, representing walkable (floors) and non-walkable (obstacle) tiles on the gameBoard. Indexes containing true are a walkable tiles, false are obstacles. The floorBoard does not usually change after initialization.

    • printFloorBoard

      public void printFloorBoard()
      Prints the floorBoard to console.

    • updateEntityBoard

      public void updateEntityBoard​(int prevX, int prevY, int newX, int newY)

    • getDistanceBetween

      public int getDistanceBetween​(int startX, int startY, int destX, int destY)
      Obtain the Manhattan distance between the 2 points (startX,startY), (destX, destY)

    • getDistanceBetween

      public int getDistanceBetween​(Node n1, Node n2)
      Obtain the Manhattan distance between the 2 Nodes

    • getDistanceToPlayer

      public int getDistanceToPlayer​(Node node)
      Obtain the Manhattan distance from the given Node to the player. Returns -1 if player does not exist.

    • getNextMoveTo

      public Node getNextMoveTo​(int sourceX, int sourceY, int destX, int destY)
      A* search algorithm to get the next move from (sourceX, sourceY) to (destX, destY).

    • getNextMoveTo

      public Node getNextMoveTo​(Entity source, Entity dest)

    • getNextMoveTo

      public Node getNextMoveTo​(int startX, int startY, Entity dest)

    • getNextMoveTo

      public Node getNextMoveTo​(Entity source, int destX, int destY)
      A* search algorithm to get the next move to (destX, destY).
      Parameters:
      source - the Entity whose position we're starting from

    • getNextMoveToPlayer

      public Node getNextMoveToPlayer​(Entity source)
      A* search algorithm to get the next move to player.
      Parameters:
      source - the Entity whose position we're starting from

    • getNextMoveToPlayer

      public Node getNextMoveToPlayer​(int sourceX, int sourceY)

    • getNextMoveKnightTo

      public Node getNextMoveKnightTo​(int sourceX, int sourceY, int destX, int destY)
      Function to handle the next move for Knight enemies. A* search algorithm to get the next move from (sourceX, sourceY) to (destX, destY) with chess Knight moves.

    • getNextMoveKnightToPlayer

      public Node getNextMoveKnightToPlayer​(Entity source)
      Function to handle the next move for Knight enemies. A* search algorithm to get the next move to player with chess Knight moves.
      Parameters:
      source - the Entity whose position we're starting from

    • getNextMovePatrol

      public Node getNextMovePatrol​(Entity source)
      Function to handle the next move for Patrol enemies. Uses A* search algorithm to get the next move to player, if they are within line-of-sight.
      Parameters:
      source - the Entity whose position we're starting from
